title: “Angel”  Cast Reunites at NYCC 2019 for the Show's 20th Anniversary
author: AmyAckerFanGuyChannel
comment: David missing the Show’s 20th anniversary even tho his character is the main character on the show ... Seriously David ?
I'm saddened by the fact that Andy Hallett (Lorne) is dead. He was my favorite character on the show. I miss him.
the buffy and angel panels alway have everybody but the main character themself.
Watching this now on the heels of Charisma and others outing Joss Wheadons STANK behavior
Thank you for taking/sharing this for those of us who couldn't attend, but love this cast/fandom!
description: Amy Acker & the cast of "Angel" 20th anniversary reunion at NYCC 2019
